name: claude-code-pm-plugin
description: A comprehensive PM plugin for Claude Code that provides product management capabilities including PRD generation, backlog management, project discovery, and review workflows.
author: liaochangping

commands.name: discover
commands.description: Discover and analyze project requirements and user needs

agents.name: pm_discovery
agents.description: Agent for project discovery and requirement gathering

agents.name: pm_tech_bridge
agents.description: Agent for bridging PM and technical requirements
